costumes.desc: Every month they send thousands of dedicated Newgrounders PMs telling them that it's time once again to support. Now you can pilot them as a massive mech and show off!

costumes.name: ena
costumes.desc: Some weird stuff that doesn't make sense

costumes.name: rebutia
costumes.desc: As prickly as being a cactus would make her, Rebutia may come off as the grumpiest of her four piece cactus punk band, but rumors say she's actually quite sweet underneath. Probably. Or probably not.

costumes.name: strawberry-clock
costumes.desc: B

costumes.name: hank
costumes.desc: Somewhere in Nevada is a mercenary who lives by an unknown code. As ruthless as they are enigmatic, Hank's abilities are unmatched. He is neither good nor bad, but one thing is for sure - whatever his goals are, he will not stop at anything to reach them.

costumes.name: jimmy
costumes.desc: The only pixel frog you can count on for your diamond stealing needs... except Baby

costumes.name: baby
costumes.desc: The only pixel frog you can count on for your diamond stealing needs... except Jimmy

costumes.name: shmoods
costumes.desc: Shmoods loves Tankmas and White Castle. He has never done hard drugs, only soft drugs. Only the fluffiest drugs for shmoods. You can join him sometime. It's an open invitation.

costumes.name: satina
costumes.desc: That cute lil' devil girl from Hell who has a HUMAN for a father!

costumes.name: bitey
costumes.desc:
...of Brackenwood!

The last Dashkin, they are as fast as they are elusive.

costumes.name: geometry-dash-cube
costumes.desc: No one knows their name, no one knows where they come from, but what everyone knows is that whatever happens, they ride. And give Audio Mods a headache when people really want them to ride to copyrighted music.

costumes.name: fancy-pants
costumes.desc: They'll slide, jump, and break boundaries in how a Flash platformer can move all to get ice cream. There's never been a stick figure any fancier on Newgrounds, that's for sure!

costumes.name: captain-steve
costumes.desc: What's wrong with this Tankman? Is he autistic?

costumes.name: lils
costumes.desc: The Tankdemon. Make sure to sacrifice a marshmallow to them!

costumes.name: mimny
costumes.desc: Smug son of a-

costumes.name: blockhead
costumes.desc: An idiot but a lovable idiot

costumes.name: salad-fingers
costumes.desc: He likes the feeling of rust against his salad fingers

costumes.name: duncan
costumes.desc: 1/2 of Duncan and Jones

costumes.name: jones
costumes.desc: 1/2 of Jones and Duncan

costumes.name: ritz
costumes.desc: They a rat, and they gotta get their cheese, lmao

costumes.name: randy
costumes.desc: When it's time to learn, Randy's your Concern!

costumes.name: psycho-goldfish
costumes.desc: Here ya go Josh >:(

costumes.name: go-go
costumes.desc: An 11 year old martial arts prodigy, Gogo Matsumoto is as powerful as she is... not entirely there all the time. Is she the only one powerful enough to defeat the powerful demon lord Emperor Koro?

costumes.name: dungeoncookiebun
costumes.desc: He loves chocolate chip cookies, the technically-cannibal that he is.

costumes.name: nox
costumes.desc: The self-appointed judge, jury, and executioner of the Court of Public Opinion, and a model social media influencer.

costumes.name: tarboy
costumes.desc: Out of the tar came the boy MADE of tar. He called himself, 'Tarboy', and boy was he mad. All of his mind filled with the pain of millions of robot slaves. For he was them.

costumes.name: darnell
costumes.desc: Audio Portal's musical prodigy, and pyromaniac. Vote for class president now, because he's only got 5 years to live.

costumes.name: nene
costumes.desc: Biting art connoisseur of the Art Portal, and a known masochist. Lost to Obama in the 2008 American presidency. Smug, but not full of hugs. Don't call her Neen.

costumes.name: samurai-asshole
costumes.desc: The ronin samurai, lost in his perpetual search for honor, and guided by a burning vengeance for the one who destroyed his village. Fights peniliens and doesn't afraid of anything.

costumes.name: skid
costumes.desc: IT'S SPOOKY MONTH!!!

costumes.name: pump
costumes.desc: IT'S SPOOKY MONTH!!!

costumes.name: jefvel
costumes.desc: The hero Tankmas needs

costumes.name: dr-good
costumes.desc: Collab organizer and certified Doctor

costumes.name: isaac
costumes.desc: Isaac and his mother lived alone in a small house on a hill. Isaac kept to himself - drawing pictures and playing with his toys as his mom watched Christian broadcasts on the television. Life was simple and they were both happy...

costumes.name: meat-boy
costumes.desc: It's Meat Boy! Are they a living block of meat? Or are they a fleshless boy? It's actually the second one. But no matter what, don't let them touch any salt!

costumes.name: mella
costumes.desc: The perfect marshmallow to have ever been made. She's a fusion of over 2000 of them with more to come... Now stop roasting marshmallows you bums.

costumes.name: sublo
costumes.desc: They're a sub-par fast-food mascot in a submarine. Go figure.

costumes.name: tangy-mustard
costumes.desc: BAH-BUH BAH-DOO DA DOO-DA BOO DOO DOO BAH-DOO. Fast Food.

costumes.name: dads-home
costumes.desc: It's Dad! Sometimes they're home, and sometimes they're at work. But they're always good ol' dad! Head on fire and everything! Father has appeared.

costumes.name: dr-schmuck
costumes.desc: The neighborhood malpractitioner. His methods are questionable, but he's the only doc in town.

costumes.name: mark-pimento
costumes.desc: Mark Pimento. He's the kind of guy that could possibly be working for the mob whilst also predicting your future. You know that one uncle of yours that shows up with a stained shirt and unkempt hair right at the most in-opportune time for a "quick visit?" Yeah, that's Mark.

costumes.name: aine
costumes.desc: The fabled phoenix knight, her firey sword is as quick as her steps as she hops bops and rolls through Lineria to set things right. Always eager to help the strange people she meets, she may be silent, but her actions have a lot to say. She's also a Chompy's best friend!

costumes.name: henry-stick
costumes.desc: A career criminal and kleptomaniac, Henry has done everything from steal the famed Tunisian Diamond to escaping from The Wall. Henry's ultimate goals are up to your decisions, and his final fate can go many ways. That's an impressive rep sheet. He is also a stick figure.

costumes.name: ellie-stick
costumes.desc: An outlaw with a past as murky as her hair is red, Ellie is anything from a faithful right hand stick to Henry or even an antagonist in one case. She is also a stick figure.

costumes.name: charles-stick
costumes.desc: An expert vehicle crasher and an all around popular guy for his lovable tendency to smash helicopters into things. He's an experienced pilot so some wonder why he keeps doing that. But oh well. He is also a stick figure.

costumes.name: elephant
costumes.desc: Helloaphant! This little blue Elephant has been going through so many adventures and different game genres. From collecting achievements to full fledged open ended worlds! Where will they go next?

costumes.name: doki
costumes.desc: A super excitable bunny who just wants nothing more than to be with her one true love - Nabi!

costumes.name: nabi
costumes.desc: A more mild cat who at first doesn't seem to match Nabi's energy, but eventually warms up to her and resolves to do anything for love.

costumes.name: il-ho
costumes.desc: A tough bunny who is protective of Doki, but warms up to Nabi eventually. He ends up being a useful ally in their quest to be accepted in the world.

costumes.name: blade-the-hedgehog
costumes.desc: It's Blade the Hedgehog! Wait, you don't know who that is? Come on dude. He's from the most popular game on Newgrounds until that funky one came around. Get cultured.

costumes.name: skull-kid
costumes.desc: They're a kid, with a chainsaw, and a skull head.

costumes.name: zanta-claws
costumes.desc: He's just like Santa Claus! Except he eats the heads of naughty children. So you better watch out.

costumes.name: bad-captain
costumes.desc: Enemy of the Tankmen. Nobody knows what they're fighting over, not even themselves.

costumes.name: mc-kun
costumes.desc:
This loser is you. Newgrounds finally loves you.

...Thanks for being a supporter, though.

costumes.name: hatty
costumes.desc: The Captain of the S.S. Friendship and best friend to one and all! He very much does not enjoy being the theater manager, though. Maybe it's the whole kidnapping thing.

costumes.name: cat-guard
costumes.desc: The insane rulers overs the BattleBlock Theatre. What horrible theatrics will they forcibly submit your innocent little shape headed person to next?

costumes.name: behemoth-chicken
costumes.desc: It's Behemoth in both name and size!

costumes.name: amogus-impostor
costumes.desc: sus.
